name: WCSessionDelegate
desc: A delegate protocol that defines methods for receiving messages sent by a WCSession object.

items.name: func session(WCSession, activationDidCompleteWith: WCSessionActivationState, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session has finished activating.

items.name: func sessionDidBecomeInactive(WCSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session will stop communicating with the current Apple Watch.

items.name: func sessionDidDeactivate(WCSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session has delivered all the data from the previous session, and that communication with the Apple Watch has ended.

items.name: func sessionWatchStateDidChange(WCSession)
items.desc: Indicates a change to the counterpart’s information.

items.name: func sessionReachabilityDidChange(WCSession)
items.desc: Indicates a change to the counterpart’s reachability status.

items.name: func sessionCompanionAppInstalledDidChange(WCSession)
items.desc: Indicates a change to the companion app’s installed state.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didReceiveApplicationContext: [String : Any])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session has received context data from the counterpart.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didReceiveMessage: [String : Any])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an immediate message has arrived.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didReceiveMessage: [String : Any], replyHandler: ([String : Any]) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an immediate message has arrived, and it requires a response.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didReceiveMessageData: Data)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an immediate data message has arrived.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didReceiveMessageData: Data, replyHandler: (Data) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an immediate data message has arrived, and it requires a response.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didReceiveUserInfo: [String : Any])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session successfully received a data directory from its counterpart.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didFinish: WCSessionUserInfoTransfer, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a data transfer operation has finished successfully or ended because of an error.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didReceive: WCSessionFile)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session successfully received a file from its counterpart.

items.name: func session(WCSession, didFinish: WCSessionFileTransfer, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a file transfer has finished successfully or ended because of an error.
